186  inline void setComponent(Component* component) {
187  // Delete all components of the given type
188  ComponentType type = component->getComponentType();
189  if (hasComponent(type)) {
190  for (const auto& comp : m_components.at((int)type)) {
191  delete comp;
192  }
193  }
194  // Replace components
195  m_components[(int)type] = { component };
196  }
197 
201  bool removeComponent(Component* component);

204  bool canAdd(Component* component);

217  std::shared_ptr<SceneObject> parent() const;
218  void setParent(const std::shared_ptr<SceneObject>& parent);
219 
222  Component* hasComponent(ComponentType type, uint32_t idx = 0) const {
223  if (type == ComponentType::kTransform) {
224  // Special case for transform
225  return const_cast<TransformComponent*>(&m_transformComponent);
226  }
227 
228  if (m_components[(int)type].size() <= idx) {
229  return nullptr;
230  }
231  else {
232  return m_components[(int)type][idx];
233  }
234  }
235 
236  template<typename T>
237  T* hasComponent(ComponentType type, uint32_t idx = 0) const {
238  static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<Component, T>, "Error, converted type must be a component");
239  return hasComponent(type, idx)->as<T>();
240  }
